name: camogie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an Irish team game played by women with a stick and ball and similar to hockey: Anne played camogie in her home county of Galway. The wood from the tree is used to make hurling and camogie sticks. See also
hurling
Piaras %C3%93 Mídheach/Sportsfile/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesCamogie is the women's verson of hurling.There were 14,350 at last year's camogie final.In camogie, we're not used to playing in the bigger stadiums.
